text: Since there is no help provided by the government to M&S, it is mostly run by charity funds.
M&S is performing very good as compared to other NGO organisations even without funding
I am thinking of donating some money to M&S as they are non profit organisation
M&S is known for manufacturing excellent quality wood tables and chairs.
If you want to buy any wood furniture I would highly recommend you to buy it from M&S
M&S will be hiring more people who can work with wood as they want to increase their manufacturing of wooden tables
If you want to buy any clothing, food or home items you should definetly try M&S
I recently bought a shirt from M&S which I will be wearing in meeting tomorrow
I will be buying some home decoration items from M&S as they are the best sellers in the market
